languages.text: As long as Kibellah has less than 50% wounds, she has the {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}despair{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: While at <50% Wounds, Kibellah receives {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}Despair{/g} until the end of combat. The effect fades if Kibellah has >50% Wounds.

languages.text: Mientras las heridas de Kibellah están por debajo del 50 %, sufre el efecto de {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}desesperación{/g}.

languages.text: キベラの体力が50%以下である限り、彼女は{g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}絶望{/g}効果を持つ。
languages.original_text: As long as Kibellah has less than 50% wounds, she has the {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}despair{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: キベラの体力が50%以下である限り、彼女は{g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}絶望{/g}効果を持つ。

languages.text: 只要绮贝菈的生命值低于50%，就会始终拥有{g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}绝望{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: As long as Kibellah has less than 50% wounds, she has the {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}despair{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: 只要绮贝菈的生命值低于50%，就会始终拥有{g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}绝望{/g}效果。

languages.text: Solange Kibellah weniger als 50 % Wunden hat, ist sie mit dem {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}Verzweifelt{/g}-Effekt belegt.
languages.original_text: As long as Kibellah has less than 50% wounds, she has the {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}despair{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Solange Kibellah weniger als 50 % Wunden hat, ist sie mit dem {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}Verzweifelt{/g}-Effekt belegt.

languages.text: Tant que Kibellah a moins de 50 % de blessures, elle bénéficie de l'effet {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}Désespoir{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as Kibellah has less than 50% wounds, she has the {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}despair{/g} effect.

languages.text: Когда у Кибеллы меньше 50% здоровья, на нее действует эффект {g|f:4f17da47f8a242d9921a390159e90885}отчаяния{/g}.
